issues.description:
In the function `refundBet(uint256)` the following predictable state variables are used to determine Ether recipient:
- block.number
issues.title: Dependence on predictable environment variable

issues.description: A possible transaction order independence vulnerability exists in function refundBet(uint256). The value or direction of the call statement is determined from a tainted storage location
issues.title: Transaction order dependence
